content.label: I love interior design, it is a passion of mine. I look for all sorts of apps like this and can‚Äôt find the right one. Then when I found this app, I immediately fell in love with it. Everyone on it is so supportive and help you so much to build on your work. And it isn‚Äôt that type of game where you need to match things to get more coins, you just create and post. The only tiny little problem is about the app for me is when you are taking a picture and using the 360. It gives me a hard time to get on the right angle, and where I want it. Overall, this is a perfect interior design app and it is a keeper.

Are used to love the app and it always works perfectly. But now the app overheats my phone (iPhone X) and it takes up my battery. By this I mean it will literally take out 10% of my battery within a span of 3 to 5 minutes. It has never done this before. But within the past month or two there have been multiple issues with the app.

title.label: Excellent game but will drain your battery

content.label:
First off, I love this app! It‚Äôs easy to use and they have a lot of great modern designs! Even with the free version, there are still so many furniture choices and wall and flooring choices. You can change the size of items as well.
Only downside of this app that I wish would get fixed is how quickly this app will drain your battery! I mean while using this app, your phone will become very hot and the battery will go down about 10% in just 5 minutes use of this app. So basically I would encourage you to use this app while your phone is plugged in!
But all in all, this is one of the best design apps I have ever used!

title.label: Helped me plan out my new kitchen layout!

content.label: I‚Äôm remodeling an old kitchen and this app helped me create a layout for the new kitchen! I was able to visualize my space much better in person because of the plans created in the virtual space!
Don‚Äôt waste your time unless you plan to purchase a subscription because you can do basically nothing without paying. You‚Äôre not able to even change room sizes for free.

I can‚Äôt believe I just paid $15 for a month of this. The UI is completely unusable. When I drag one corner to extend a wall, the entire room basically explodes. Every single wall is moved except the one I try to edit. Save your money. Go elsewhere. This is a scam.

I would like to start out with this app is user friendly and a bit of info about me (us).  I use it for personal use, I am not a contractor. I do how ever love to design and love that my husband and I are very DIY capable, we also use contractors for things we don‚Äôt know how to do and continue to learn. So grateful for the contractors we‚Äôve had out here to share their knowledge. 
Now to the meat (suggestions) 
I would love to see more option for wall designs, like;
Chair walls, for example 
We have white wash barn wood in our living room that is about 4 feet from the floor to the light switches. We also have a half door/ gate going into our living room in the same material.  I would love to see more chic farm house and industrial farm house looks add, for me personally and maybe others would too. Farm house looks don‚Äôt just stop in the kitchens.
Also key ring holders for by the front doors.

I‚Äôm a smalltime contractor. I do lots of repairs but also upgrades. This app allows me to make some plans and allow the clients to see what the project will look like once it‚Äôs finished with the 3-D option. This is a game breaker for me. I love this app and definitely recommend it to all you contractors out there. Keep up the good work!
